### Chart A Overall COVID case per 100k population

```{r}
cond <- WHO_data$Name %in% c("United States of America", "India", "The United Kingdom", "Germany", "Brazil")
df <- WHO_data[cond, ]
df$Name <- as.factor(df$Name)
ggplot(data = df, aes(x = Name, y = Cases...newly.reported.in.last.7.days.per.100000.population)) + geom_bar(stat = "identity", fill = "steelblue") + theme_minimal() + labs(x = "", y = "Number of new cases", title = "New cases per 100,000 population")
```
